description.en: A god created AOTU World and established the 7 Oracles to rule it on behalf of this god. The poor and rich, enslaved and free, suffering and happiness, destruction and birth: every status is ordained by God. Mortals can only accept, but cannot resist. However, God has given his people the opportunity to change their fate through "AOTU Contest." The contestants use their unique "ability" gifted by the Contest System and inbate wisdom and courage in hopes of winning the competition and becoming the world's ruler.

Chi Xing, who was nicknamed, “star of calamity”, would run into all sorts of bad luck every day. But after he met the arrogant, antisocial, Ling Ye, who had deformed legs, he unexpectedly discovered that his suffering physique improved. Whenever he was with Ling Ye, he could turn danger into safety, and Ling Ye’s gaze always made Chi Xing feel like they had met before, a feeling of familiarness. They both don’t know that their common past of suffering and agony would cause them to be tangled up together……

After Eshana Arth got into an accident at a young age, she could see people’s life expectancy and cause of death.

What if a person she bumped into by chance was destined to die the next day?

It was Eshana Arth who had mainly decided to ignore such cases, but because destinies in black were ones that could be changed, she would save the village people from danger from time to time.

However, if they were destinies that couldn’t be changed, they would be seen in red.

Imperial Calendar Year 422, on the afternoon of a peaceful day.

A bloody man had collapsed on their front garden, and his destiny was one even more distinct than blood. 

[Year 427/Cause of death: Eshana Arth]

“I’m ‘Eshana Arth’.” 

The person who is the reason why—

You will die 5 years later.
description.ko:
에샤나 아스는 어릴 적 사고를 당한 이후로
사람의 수명과 사인이 보인다.
우연히 마주친 처음 보는 사람의 죽을 날이 내일이라면? 
주로 모르는 척 지나가는 선택지를 택해온 
에샤나 아스지만, 검은색으로 보이는 운명은
바꿀 수 있는 운명이기에 때때로 마을 사람들을 
위험으로부터 구하곤 했다.

그러나 바꿀 수 없는 게 있다면, 붉은색으로 보이는 운명

제국력 422년, 평화로운 어느 날의 저녁.
집 앞 마당에 쓰러져 있는 피투성이 사내. 
그리고 그 피보다도 선명한 운명.

[427년/사인:에샤나 아스.]

"저는 '에샤나 아스'라고 해요."

당신이 5년 뒤 
죽을 이유인 사람.

description.en:
A highly educated and wealthy elite who suffers from Haphephobia(fear of touching or of being touched) is forced by his grampa to work in the countryside for a few months if he wants to inherit the company. There he meets an ordinary, kind-hearted man.  
When the hot headed cat met the cheeky dog … what kind of sparks will it burst out?

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

altTitles.ja: 血の姫と騎士

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   
"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   
The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck…  


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative raw (AC QQ)](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/648136)
- [Alternative raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28199)

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼ライジングサン   F I N A L S

altTitles.vi: Đội trưởng Tsubasa - Mặt trời mọc - Chung kết

description.en:
A web-comic continuation of Captain Tsubasa 9th arc: Rising Sun - The Final.

Rising Sun - FINALS is covering the 2nd half of the Madrid Olympics match of Japan VS. Spain and beyond.

The web-comic came to be when on April 2024 mangaka Yoichi Takahashi announced his retirement, ending Rising Sun - The Final official published serialization half-way through the match opting to continue the story at his own pace with storyboard pencil sketches, publishing them on the official Captain Tsubasa World website.

altTitles.ja: Yaiteru Futari

altTitles.ru: Брак с Нуля: Как Поджарить Нашу Любовь

altTitles.ja: 焼いてるふたり

altTitles.th: จุดรักเราด้วยเตาถ่าน

description.en: After their fateful encounter through a dating app, Kenta and Chihiro decided to get married with zero days of dating in light of Kenta’s transfer. As a couple who got married without knowing much about each other, they deepen their relationship through their regular weekend BBQs.
description.ja:
マッチングアプリで運命の出会いを果たした、健太と千尋。奥手すぎて最初の一歩を踏み出せずにいるふたりが、健太の浜松への転勤をきっかけに急進展。なんと…交際ゼロ日で結婚することに！　

お互いをよく知らないまま夫婦になったふたりは、毎週末のBBQでじっくり仲を深めていく――。
description.ru: После роковой встречи через приложение для знакомств, Кента и Чихиро решили пожениться с нулевым количеством дней знакомств в свете перевода Кенты. Как пара, которая вышла замуж, не зная многого друг о друге, они развивают свои отношения путём регулярных выходных с барбекю.
description.pt-br: Quando Kenta, de 30 anos, conhece a designer gráfica Chihiro, ele queima seu exterior descolado com sua paixão por churrasco! Agora, após um lampejo de namoro, eles são recém-casados! Embora seus empregos os mantenham separados, eles ainda têm fins de semana juntos para grelhar, e carne boa não é a única coisa que está esquentando neste relacionamento escaldante!

altTitles.ja: いのちの食べ方

description.en:
Otogiri Tobi, a 2nd grade middle school student, spends his depressing days searching for his missing older brother alongside his inhuman companion, Baku.
Tobi used to rarely speak to anyone besides Baku, however one day after his classmate Shiratama Ryuuko suddenly approaches him, his life begins to change…?

This is an adventure surrounding the “human” and the “inhuman” that a lone boy faces.
___
**Character Design:** [Mariyasu](https://mangadex.org/author/c4b0336b-a879-4634-9053-9efb11c3f71b), [Waboku](https://mangadex.org/author/03dcd51c-8a6b-4302-8c84-d943a039db25), [lack](https://mangadex.org/author/b68dc199-aaab-4deb-825a-5f3df6482b28)
___
Note: Adapted from the song and novel of the same name.

title.en: A Single Aristocrat Enjoys a Different World: The Graceful Life of a Man Who Never Gets Married

altTitles.ja-ro: Dokushin Kizoku wa Isekai wo Ouka Suru ~Kekkon Shinai Otoko no Yuuga na Ohitori-sama Life~

altTitles.ja: 独身貴族は異世界を謳歌する ～結婚しない男の優雅なおひとりさまライフ～

altTitles.id: Bangsawan Lajang Yang Menikmati Hidup di Dunia Lain

description.en:
Toshinori Dokuraba, 35 years old. A so-called single aristocrat in Japan who enjoyed a single life without wife and children, even though he was tall, handsome, highly educated and had a high income. One day, he died alone at home.

However, he was liked by Hitorigami, the God of another world, and was able to reincarnate in that world. Reborn as Zirc Louren with skills and blessings from the God, he lived a new rosy life in a different world - then he turned 28 years old and enjoyed the single life again...

This is a story about the life of a single aristocrat who never gets married even if he reincarnates in another world.

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

description.en:
Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
 Brought to you by mmk of 'Love Comedy Quest,' this is a pure love short comedy of the new era about 'neighbors'!

title.en: Mahou Shounen wa, × × de Sekai o Sukuu.

altTitles.ja: 魔法少年は、××で世界を救う

altTitles.en: The magical boy save the world with xxx

description.en: Akira Matsuno is shunned by those around him due to his bad eyes and slender figure, but for some reason, Umenosuke Takenaka, the captain of the basketball team, likes him. But one day, Umenosuke ends up injuring Akatsuki's arm when he saves Akatsuki and his kitten from being hit by a truck. As Akatsuki is crying over the fact that Umenosuke will never be able to play basketball again because of him, the kitten he rescued appears in front of him. In exchange for the complete healing of Umenosuke's arm, he offers to become a magical boy and exterminate monsters...! Akatsuki immediately agreed, but when he put on the monster extermination suit, there was a cute "me" who looked nothing like the strong Akatsuki... , he was told a strange condition that he needed someone to pour sperm into him...!?
The story of a generation filled with romance and chaos.

title.en: Miss Wolf and Her Fox Sister

altTitles.zh: 狼小姐和她的狐狸妹妹

description.en: [Savage Wolf X Cunning Fox] In the modern therianthrope world, everyone respects the law of the jungle where the strong prey on the weak. Twenty-year-old Yu Wenxi, as a gray wolf therianthrope, stands at the top of the food chain. She has made a name for herself with her fists. She is violent and volatile, always looking down on the weak. Until one day, when her stepsister left a fox cub with her. From then on, the wild wolf turned into a good big dog. She vowed to raise the crybaby cub, train it into a model student, and give it the best that life has to offer. However, the little fox is hiding a wicked heart under the guise of a good girl...

Gumiho Yeon, who despises humans, accidentally avoids an accident with the help of human Dong-i. In essence, a nine-tailed fox is a being that has to repay the favor it receives. Yeon visits Dong-i without skipping a day for Bo-eun, and Dong-i is only burdened with such a kite. The two, who seemed never to be able to get closer, know each other's wounds and shortcomings, fill them in, and develop good feelings... The two are different in their environment, race, and way of loving. Can a nine-tailed fox and human love have a happy ending?
description.ko:
인간을 멸시하는 구미호 연은 우연히 인간인 동이의 도움을 받아 사고를 면하게 된다.

본디 구미호란 은혜를 입으면 갚아야만 하는 존재.
연은 보은을 위해 하루도 거르지 않고 동이를 찾아가고, 동이는 그런 연이 부담스럽기만 하다.

절대 가까워질 수 없을 것 같던 둘은 서로의 상처와 결핍을 알고, 채워주며 좋은 감정을 키워나가는데...

살아온 환경도, 종족도, 사랑하는 방식마저 다른 둘. 구미호와 인간의 사랑은 과연 행복한 결말로 맺어질 수 있을까?

altTitles.ja: きみとピコピコ

description.en: Oota, an otaku, joined the game club to live his ideal high school life. That was when he met by chance the freshman gal, Ageha Onisaki!! They dive straight into playing video games, but Ageha's choices are the Famicom (NES), the Super Famicom (SNES), and the Megadrive (Sega Genesis)! Who the heck is this person!? Playing a wide range from famous to retro games, the gal and the otaku start their heart-throbbing life!
description.pt-br: Oota, um otaku, ingressou no clube de jogos para viver sua vida ideal de colegial. Foi quando ele conheceu por acaso a caloura Ageha Onisaki!! Eles mergulham direto nos videogames, mas as escolhas de Ageha são NES, SNES e Megadora! Quem diabos é essa garota!? Jogando uma ampla variedade de jogos retrôs famosos, gal e o otaku começam sua agitada vida juntos!

title.en: Otaku-kun no Seiheki wo Isshou Yugamete Iku Ishuzoku Musume-tachi

altTitles.ja: オタク君の性癖を一生歪めていく異種族娘たち

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku-kun no Seiheki wo Isshou Yugamete Iku Ishuzoku Musume-tachi

altTitles.en: Interspecies Girls Who Will Twist Otaku-kun's Fetishes for the Rest of His Life

altTitles.ru: Девушки иных рас, пожизненно искажающие сексуальные предпочтения Отаку-куна

description.en:
The main character, Otaku-kun, is awakened to his special sexual proclivities through a series of happening interactions with girls of different races!

Can you keep your reason?
description.ja: 主人公のオタク君を特殊性癖に目覚めさせてしまう、異種族娘たちとのハプニング交流の数々！君は理性を保つことができるか!?

altTitles.ja: 教え子くんとはデキません

altTitles.en: My Student Grew Huge and Proposed to Me

altTitles.vi: Cậu học trò nay đã “lớn” và cầu hôn tôi

description.en:
A teacher finds herself getting a marriage proposal from her former student, who has had a significant growth-spurt since they last met.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/_71416/status/1702677638756872490)
description.ja: 18歳年下の教え子がグイグイ求婚とか告白とかしてくるっ!!

altTitles.ja: シャドーハウス
シャドーハウス カラー版

description.en:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
description.es:
Nobles sombras sin rostro que viven en una vasta mansión, atendidos por muñecos vivientes que pasan gran parte de su tiempo limpiando el hollín emitido por sus misteriosos maestros.  
  
Sigue la historia de Emilyko, una joven y alegre muñeca viviente, mientras aprende sus deberes como asistente de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.ja: 不思議な洋館に住む、 顔のないシャドー一族と、 世話係の“生き人形”たち。 彼らが織りなす、 摩訶不思議な日常とは…？
description.ru: Безликие теневые дворяне, живущие в огромном особняке, сопровождаемые живыми куклами, которые проводят большую часть своего времени, очищая сажу, бесконечно испускаемую их таинственными хозяевами.
description.es-la: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.pt-br: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.

title.en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby: Star Blossom

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘 プリティーダービー スターブロッサム

description.en:
The popular cross-media content "Uma Musume Pretty Derby" features "Uma Musume" who have inherited the names and souls of numerous racehorses! A new legend begins with the indomitable horse girl "Sakura Laurel" as the main character.

---

- [Alternative Raw](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/4856001361118480104)
description.ja: 「挑戦なくして、得られるものなど何もない」　見習いトレーナー・椿が出会ったのは、ガラスの脚を抱えたデビュー前のウマ娘・サクラローレル。半人前の2人が見た頂点への夢は、無謀なのか――。

altTitles.ja: ディザインズ

description.en:
Beyond the natural world lies a breed of abnormal beings... HA, or Humanized Animals. 
They are a hybrid of human and animal, "designed" at the genetic level. Possessing astonishing physical capabilities, 
these HA are deployed into scenes of intrigue by certain ambitious individuals, seeking to showcase their true value. 

For what purpose did humans design these beings? Behind it all lies a grand plan connected to the future of humanity!

title.en: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.ja: FPSで初心者ボコってリアルファイトに発展した結果w

altTitles.en: After Beating a Noob in an FPS, He Wanted to Fight Me in Real Life LOL

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Tôi Bón Hành Trong Game, Có Đứa Hẹn Kèo Đánh Tôi!

altTitles.id: Hasil dari Mengalahkan seorang Pemula di FPS yang Berkembang Menjadi Pertarungan di RL haha

altTitles.ro: Luptând Cu Un Începător La Jocurile FPS

description.en:
After I beat a noob in an FPS, he challenged me to a fight in real life!?

I decided to go along with it just for fun, but when I got there, a cute girl was waiting for me!

This is a romcom featuring a scummy male lead and a feisty female lead!

(Source: [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/1564434/vol_no/001))
description.ja:
FPSで初心者をボコったらリアルファイトに誘われた！？
面白半分で行ってみるとそこにいたのは可愛い女の子！
クズ系主人公と、闘志マンマンのヒロインによる
ラブコメディ！？
未公開の前日章「とある1日」も追加しています！

altTitles.ja: お忍び同棲

description.en: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！
description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

altTitles.ja: ヴィジランテ-僕のヒーローアカデミアILLEGALS-

altTitles.ja-ro: Vigilante: Boku no Hero Academia Illegals

description.en:
In the world of Kouhei Horikoshi's Boku no Hero Academia, nearly everyone in the world has powers known as "Quirks". Normally, the law enforces the rule that citizens cannot use their Quirks out in the open, and that privilege is reserved only for registered superheroes. However, a select few have chosen to reject this rule. They are known as vigilantes - people with the hearts of heroes, but the reputation of villains.   
  
This is their story.
description.pt: Spin off de Boku no Hero Academia que tem como protagonistas os Vigilantes!
description.ru: Второй спин-офф популярного сёнена «Моя геройская академия», повествующий о «героях-нелегалах», вершащих правосудие без лицензии профессионального героя.
description.pt-br:
Vivendo em uma sociedade super-humana, é difícil se sentir especial. Mais ainda quando os holofotes são reservados aos heróis profissionais, aqueles legalmente autorizados a usar seus poderes especiais conhecidos como "Individualidades" em público e para o bem maior.

Koichi Haimawari cresceu aspirando a vida de herói, mas com uma habilidade medíocre como "deslizar" que o prende ao chão, ele logo percebeu que só poderia os admirar de baixo. Ainda assim, Koichi se contenta em utilizar seus poderes para fazer boas ações no dia a dia, como devolver itens perdidos e ajudar idosas a atravessar a rua.

Contudo, a vida pacata de Koichi iria mudar abruptamente quando ele é resgatado de uma briga em um beco por um "vigilante", ou herói ilegal, Knuckleduster. Vendo potencial heroico em Koichi, Knuckleduster requisita a sua ajuda em buscar a fonte de uma perigosa droga conhecida como "Trigger" que intensifica as Individualidades do usuário ao custo de sua racionalidade.

Se passando em um tempo antes da historia original, My Hero Academia: Vigilantes segue Koichi quando ele decide aceitar a reputação de vilão e se tornar um vigilante, trabalhando nas sombras da lei para impedir que o crime tome conta da superfície.

altTitles.ja: ヴィジランテ-僕のヒーローアカデミアILLEGALS-

altTitles.ja-ro: Vigilante: Boku no Hero Academia Illegals

(My Anime List)

altTitles.ja: 半人前の恋人

altTitles.th: มือใหม่หัดรัก

description.en: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me…!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
description.ru: В один прекрасный день Ибуки Синтаро поручили сделать ящик для предложений только потому, что он состоит в художественном кружке. Пока он работал с непривычными для него инструментами, он заметил на себе сверлящий взгляд устрашающей девчонки. Неожиданно она забирает у него пилу и энергичными движениями начинает резать доску! Так начинаются отношения между мальчишкой-художником и девчонкой-мастерицей!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง ขณะที่กำลังทำงานอุปกรณ์ในห้องศิลปะ มีเด็กสาวที่มีหน้าตาน่ากลัวกำลังเฝ้ามองมาที่ผม...!?” เรื่องราวความรักคอมเมดี้ระหว่างสาวช่างฝีมือกับหนุ่มสายศิลป์!?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, quando eu estava fazendo material escolar na sala de arte, uma garota muito assustadora estava olhando para mim...!? 

Menina do artesanato vs. garoto da arte comédia romântica!!

altTitles.ja: 変人のサラダボウル＠comic

description.en:
While trailing someone, the poor detective Sousuke Kaburagi runs into Sara, an imperial princess from another world who uses black magic. Sousuke and Sara gradually begin living together, but in the blink of an eye, Sara becomes accustomed to modern-day Japan...

Meanwhile, Livia—a female knight who transferred to the world after Sara, is enjoying a surprisingly pleasant life, even though she is homeless. The two otherworldly individuals who live a pleasant and strong life influence Sousuke and the other oddballs who live here, such as a devilish lawyer, a divorce agent, and a cult leader. 

---

**Links:** 
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453038)
description.ja:
異世界の皇女、岐阜で無双！？

貧乏探偵・鏑矢惣助は、尾行中に天から降ってきた金髪の美少女・サラに遭遇。
彼女は自身を異世界の皇女だと言い、とんでもない魔術を披露する。
なし崩し的に惣助の家に居候することになったサラは、
なぜか探偵の仕事に興味を持ちはじめ…？
サラの従者である女騎士・リヴィアをはじめ、変わり者たちが続々登場！
岐阜を舞台に贈る、天下無双の群像喜劇！！

description.en: The year is 2019 in Puerto Larraín, Chile. Glass Lariats follows the story of Josefina Torres, a 17 year old teenager, on her adventure to find her sister who was kidnapped for unknown reasons. During her adventure, Josefina will fight to learn about her family history and unveil the mystery behind the man who appears in her dreams.

altTitles.ja: ホームルーム

description.en: High school student Sachiko is bullied daily and is the recipient of constant unpleasant pranks in class. The culprit is unknown, however, in truth, to Sachiko those days were not particularly painful. That is because her beloved Aida-sensei is there to save her. Bright, handsome, and with a strong sense of justice, he is popular with everyone. Of course to Sachiko he is her special hero. However, Aida-sensei has a secret…
description.vi: Sakurai Sachiko, một nữ sinh cấp ba đang phải trải qua cuộc sống học đường vô cùng khó khăn và mệt mỏi khi cô thường xuyên phải chịu đựng những trò đùa ác ý từ một kẻ nào đó. Và mỗi khi cô gặp rắc rối thì thầy Aida, một giáo viên chính trực và điển trai sẽ xuất hiện để giúp đỡ cô. Đối với Sakurai, thầy Aida là một người hùng nhưng với thầy Aida thì Sakurai là...

altTitles.ja: 尾守つみきと奇日常。

altTitles.en: Tsumiki Ogami & the Strange Everyday Life.

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.pt-br: Tsumiki Ogami e seu estranho coditiano.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

altTitles.ru: Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь

altTitles.fr: Ogami Tsumiki et l'étrange vie du quotidien

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami và Cuộc sống diệu kì!

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.fr:
Aujourd'hui, nous vivons à l'ère de la diversité. L'expression « non-humains » appartient au passé. Les « Genjin » vivent leur vie en interaction avec les êtres humains.

Un garçon humain, Yutaka Shinsou, est troublé. Il est tellement habitué à être en phase avec son environnement qu'il ne comprend plus ses propres sentiments. Au lycée Keiki, que fréquentent de nombreux « Genjin », il rencontre Tsumiki Ogami, un loup-garou. Elle est mignonne, puissante, un peu hors du commun et gentille.

Lorsqu'il passe du temps avec elle, le cœur de Yutaka est plus bruyant que d'habitude. Une vie quotidienne « inhabituelle » avec Tsumiki le loup-garou.

Le nouveau parcours normal de la jeunesse est sur le point de commencer.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.pl:
Obecnie żyjemy w erze różnorodności. Wyrażenie „nie-ludzie” należy już do przeszłości. „Genjin” żyją w interakcji z ludźmi.

Pewien ludzki chłopiec, Yutaka Shinsou, jest zaniepokojony. Jest tak przyzwyczajony do bycia w zgodzie z otoczeniem, że nie rozumie już własnych uczuć. W Liceum Keiki, gdzie uczęszcza wielu „Genjin”, spotyka Tsumiki Ogami, wilkołaka. Jest urocza, potężna, trochę nietypowa i miła.

Kiedy spędza z nią czas, serce Yutaki staje się głośniejsze niż zwykle. Niezwykłe niecodzienne życie z wilkołakiem Tsumiki.
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.pt-br:
Hoje, vivemos numa era de diversidade. A frase “não-humanos” é coisa do passado. “Genjin” vivem suas vidas interagindo com seres humanos.

Um menino humano, Yutaka Shinsou, está preocupado. Ele está tão acostumado a estar em sintonia com o ambiente que não entende mais seus próprios sentimentos. No Colégio Keiki, onde muitos "Genjin" estudam, ele conhece Tsumiki Ogami, uma lobisomem. Ela é fofa, poderosa, um pouco fora do comum e gentil.

Quando ele passa um tempo com ela, o coração de Yutaka fica mais acelerado do que o normal. Girando uma vida cotidiana "incomum" com o lobisomem Tsumiki.

O novo gráfico normal da juventude está prestes a começar.

title.en: Ossan Teihen Chiyu-shi to Manasume no Henkyou Life

altTitles.ja: おっさん底辺治癒士と愛娘の辺境ライフ ～中年男が回復スキルに覚醒して、英雄へ成り上がる～

altTitles.en: The Frontier Life of The Low-Class Ossan Healer And The Lovely Girl
The Frontier Life of the Low-Class Old Man Healer and His Beloved Daughter
Old Man, the Low-tier Healer, and the Beloved Daughter's Frontier Life ~A Middle-aged Man Awakens to Healing Skills and Rises to Become a Hero~

description.en: F-rank healer, Reda Dixon (30), is expelled from his party due to his age. Heartbroken, Reda decides on a change of pace by moving to the rural town of Almus. On his journey there, he encounters a blonde-haired girl named Mina, who is dressed in ragged clothes. With no parents in sight, the kind-hearted Reda decides to become her guardian. In Almus, Reda, who starts a new life with the girl, becomes known as "Teacher" by the townspeople, thanks to his unconsciously cheat-level 『Healing Magic』! Together, they solve various troubles and deepen their family bonds.
description.ja: Fランクの治癒士、レダ・ディクソン(30)は、年齢を理由にパーティーから追放されてしまう。傷心のレダは心機一転、田舎町・アムルスへの移住を決意。その道中で、みすぼらしい恰好をしたブロンドヘアの少女・ミナと出会う。アムルスで、少女とともに新生活を始めたレダは、無自覚チートだった『回復魔法』のおかげで町民から“先生”と呼ばれる存在までに!二人は様々なトラブルを解決するとともに、家族の絆を深めていく―。
description.ru: Рэда Диксон, 30 летний лекарь F ранга, который был отстранен от службы из-за возраста. От безысходности он решает переехать в Загородную деревушку Амурт для того, чтобы начать жизнь с чистого листа. По стечениям обстоятельств он встречает Мину, маленькую девочку со светлыми волосами, одетую в одни лохмотья. Родителей у нее нет, поэтому добродушный Рэда становится ей опекуном. Благодаря магии исцеления Рэды, все в поселке называют его "Сенсеем". Рэда и его семья вместе решают проблемы и укрепляют семейные связи.

altTitles.ja: 多聞くん今どっち！？

altTitles.en: Which Face Does Tamon Have Now?

description.en:
High schooler Utage Kinoshita works part-time as a housekeeper so that she can afford her fangirl obsession with Tamon Fukuhara, her favorite member of boy band F/ACE. When work serendipitously sends her to the home of her idol, she discovers that the real Tamon couldn’t be more different from his wild and sexy onstage persona.
Tamon is an insecure mess in real life, and what’s worse, he’s threatening to quit! Utage refuses to let anyone stand in Tamon’s way - least of all himself. What’s a fangirl to do but roll up her sleeves and support her favorite singer with everything she’s got?

title.ja-ro: Naze Boku no Sekai wo Daremo Oboeteinai no ka?

altTitles.vi: Phy Sew lu, ele tis Es feo r-delis ec I.

altTitles.en: Why Doesn't Anybody Remember My World?

altTitles.ja: なぜ僕の世界を誰も覚えていないのか？

altTitles.en: Why Does Nobody Remember Me in This World?

altTitles.zh-hk: 為何無人記得我的世界？

altTitles.zh: 为何无人记得我的世界？

description.en:
"Why doesn't anybody remember the true world…!"  
The great war between the five races over the world ended when the Hero Sid led humanity to victory. A young soldier named Kai watched as that world was suddenly overwritten before his eyes. In the rewritten world, Sid never existed. Humanity had lost. There, dragons and demons ruled the world. Kai was forgotten by everyone around him.  
However, after encountering the mysterious girl Rinne, Kai decides to break this rewritten destiny. In a world without a hero, he inherits the hero's sword and martial arts and challenges the mighty enemy races in power. Thus begins the quest of one boy, forgotten by the world, to take back the future!
description.pt-br: "Por que ninguém se lembra do mundo verdadeiro...!" A época em que a grande corrida das cinco tribos competindo pela hegemonia no solo terminou com a vitória da humanidade liderada pelo herói Sid. No entanto, o mundo foi de repente "sobrescrito " na frente de um menino chamado Kai. No mundo reescrito, Kai viu a cena onde os seres humanos perderam para as cinco tribos por causa da ausência de herói Sid. Aqui dragões e demônios dominam o solo, e Kai é uma existência esquecida por todos os seres humanos. No entanto, depois de encontrar a misteriosa menina Rinne, Kai decide quebrar este destino reescrito. Em um mundo sem heróis, ele herda a espada do herói e a arte marcial e desafia as raças inimigas poderosas que reinam.

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

altTitles.ja: あそこではたらくムスブさん

altTitles.th: คุณมุสุบุกับงานของเธอ

description.en: Sagami Gorou works in sales at Shounan Rubber Industries Co., Ltd. He is secretly harboring feelings for Musubu, a girl working in the company's integrated development department. And what this lovely young scientist is researching day and night are actually…
description.es-la: La historia sigue a Sagami Gouro de 24 años que empieza a trabajar en Industria Shounan Gum S.A, allí conocerá a la investigadora Musubu-san una chica que trabaja en el laboratorio de desarrollo de asistencia médica la "casa", su primer encuentro no será precisamente el esperado.
description.pt-br: Sagami Gorou trabalha no setor de vendas da Indústria de Borracha Shounan Ltda e tem guardado seus sentimentos por Musubu, uma garota que trabalha no departamento de desenvolvimento integrado, em segredo. O objeto de estudo desta adorável cientista, na verdade é…

altTitles.ja: 正反対なわたしたち

altTitles.ja-ro: Sei Hantai na Danjo to Inu no Deai

altTitles.en: Encounter Between Polar Opposites and Their Dogs

description.en:
A man and a woman with opposite personalities and two dogs meet while out for a walk.

 Fluffy small dog x chattering boyfriend,
 Scary big dog x Powerful girlfriend...
 There is no doubt that you will be warmed by the gap moe that fills the screen!!

altTitles.ja: 八乙女×２

description.en:
Yaotome Kai is a sixth grade elementary school student with a new neighbor living in the apartment next door. The slightly weird girl Yaotome Haruru. Eating school lunches, having likes and dislikes, and forgetting things as elementary school students do. Casually hanging out whilst their parents get along, as next-door neighbors do.

The latest work by "Seitokai Yakuindomo" author Ujiie Tozen.

A comedy of two elementary school neighbors.

(Source: Pocket Shounen Magazine, translated)

altTitles.th: เทพเกรียน โรงเรียนมัธยม

altTitles.ja: ゴッド・オブ・ハイスクール

description.en:
While an island half-disappearing from the face of the earth, a mysterious organization is sending out invitations for a tournament to every skilled fighter in the world. If you win you can have ANYTHING you want.  
They're recruiting only the best to fight the best and claim the title of The God of High School!

title.en: Doushitara Osananajimi ♀️ no Kanojo ni Naremasu Ka!?

altTitles.ja: どうしたら幼馴染♀の彼女になれますか！？

altTitles.en: How Do I Get Together With My Childhood Friend?

altTitles.id: Gimana Caranya Agar Aku Bisa Jadi Pacarnya Teman Masa Kecil ♀ Ku?

altTitles.en: How Do I Turn My Best Friend Into My Girlfriend?

altTitles.ko: 어떻게 해야 소꿉친구의 여친이 될 수 있나요?!

altTitles.zh: 怎样才能成为发小的女友呢！？

description.en: High schoolers Minami Ikoma and Yuzu Makita have been childhood friends since grade school. Since their parents are friends, they have always been together. However, as Minami sees her friend get confessed to, feelings in her own heart start to sprout. A romantic comedy of two childhood friend starts.
description.id: Siswa sekolah menengah Minami Ikoma dan Yuzu Makita telah menjadi teman masa kecil sejak sekolah dasar. Karena orang tua mereka berteman, mereka selalu bersama. Namun, saat Minami melihat temannya ditembak, perasaan di hatinya sendiri mulai tumbuh. Sebuah komedi romantis dari dua teman masa kecil dimulai.

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

title.en: The Crazy Killer Whale’s Favourite Penguin

description.en:
Born as a penguin, I miraculously transformed into a human. The problem? My guardian, the Tower Master, hates beastmen. Fearing discovery, I ran away, only to be found out by a self-proclaimed penguin enthusiast.

Whale clan orca beastman, Suuradel, looked at me intensely, his eyes reddening sensually.

“Ha… Your wild eyes are incredible.”

Those aren’t eyes, just white feathers.

“May I touch your belly fat?”

Seriously? Furious, I pecked at him, but he looked oddly elated.

“Did you just kiss me?”

…It seems I got caught by a lunatic, not a penguin enthusiast.

altTitles.ja: 武装少女マキャヴェリズム

description.en: The Private Aichi Symbiosis Academy was originally a high school for high-class girls. When it became co-ed, the girls, out of fear, asked to be permitted to bring weapons to school. When that was enforced, a five-member vigilante corps-like organization called the "Supreme Five Swords" was also formed. After many generations, the five swords eventually became a group which corrected problematic students, so the academy started proactively accepting such students in order to correct them. Nomura Fudou was sent to that school after being part of a huge brawl. What will he do when the only options he has after enrolling are being expelled from that school as well, or being corrected the way the rest of the male students there were… by being forced to dress and act like girls!
description.pt-br: A Escola Privada Aichi Simbiose era originalmente uma escola para garotas da alta classe, quando se tornou mista, as garotas, por medo, pediram para serem autorizadas a levar armas para à escola. Quando isso foi imposto, um corpo de vigilância de cinco membros, chamado as 'Cinco Espadas Suprema', também foi formado. Após muitas gerações, as cinco espadas, eventualmente, se tornaram um grupo que corrigia alunos problemáticos e por causa disso a escola começou de forma proativa aceitar esses estudantes, a fim de corrigi-los. Nomura Fudou foi enviado para essa escola depois de fazer parte de uma enorme briga, o que ele fará quando as únicas opções que tem depois de se matricular são ser expulso desta escola também ou ser corrigido da mesma forma como os outros estudantes do sexo masculino foram... Sendo forçados a se vestirem e agirem como garotas!

altTitles.ja: ウィンドブレイカー

description.en: Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
description.fr:
Haruka Sakura est le genre de lycéen qui fait passer la baston avant les révisions. Fraîchement débarqué en ville, c'est donc le sourire aux lèvres qu'il compte pousser les portes du lycée Fûrin, l'établissement scolaire au pire taux de délinquance du pays... Les intentions de Haruka sont claires : se mesurer aux meilleurs bagarreurs de ce bahut et devenir le meilleur de tous ! Mais entre-temps, il se retrouve mêlé à une altercation avec une bande de brutes dans un des quartiers de la ville, avant d'être sauvé in extremis par des élèves de son lycée. Haruka réalise alors à quel genre de phénomènes il risque d'avoir affaire...

Maison d'édition FR : Pika
description.pt-br: A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Para atingir seu objetivo, porém, a primeira coisa que ele deve fazer é se juntar a uma gangue chamada Wind Breaker, que representa seu instituto e cujo objetivo é defender a cidade de outras gangues e bandidos. No entanto, para que eles o aceitem, ele terá que ganhar o respeito deles com os punhos!

altTitles.ja: Sosyage-Kanojo
ソシャゲ彼女

description.en: It is a romcom of a girl that loves her boyfriend and soshage (Social Game).

description.en: The manga centers on Yano, a virgin boy who dreams of success as an erotic manga artist. One day, he encounters a totally naked palm-sized girl.
description.ja: エロ漫画家として成功を夢みる専門学生・矢野。彼の前に突然、手のひらサイズの美少女が現れる。漫画賞を目指したいのに、俺の弁当に何かいるんです！

altTitles.ja: 空気が「読める」新入社員と無愛想な先輩

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuuki ga "Yomeru" Shinnyuushain to Buaisouna Senpai no Hanashi (Serialization)

altTitles.th: วันนี้ก็เข้าใจยากอีกแล้วนะคะ คุณรุ่นพี่สุดเฮี้ยบ

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện về cô nhân viên mới biết “đọc vị” người khác và chàng tiền bối khó gần

altTitles.zh: “能看懂”气氛的公司新人与板着脸的前辈

description.en: A slice-of-life story about a new employee who can literally read emotions and an inexpressive but actually very kind senpai at work.
description.vi: Câu chuyện đời thường về cô nhân viên mới vào công ty, người có thể “nhìn thấy” tâm trạng người khác theo đúng nghĩa đen, và chàng tiền bối có nét mặt vô cảm nhưng lại thật sự rất tốt bụng.

title.en: I Have a Second Chance at Life, so I’ll Pamper My Yandere Boyfriend for a Happy Ending!!

altTitles.ja: 人生２周目はヤンデレ彼氏を甘やかしてハッピーエンドになります!!

altTitles.es: Tengo una Segunda Oportunidad en la Vida, así que consentiré a mi Novio Yandere para tener un Final Feliz!!

altTitles.ja-ro: Jinsei 2-Shuume wa Yandere Kareshi wo Amayakashite Happy End ni Narimasu!!

description.en:
She must avoid dying in her second chance at life?!
A choose-wisely romantic comedy! ☆

On the day of her high school graduation, Ichinose Himari was shoved off to her death by her boyfriend, Taniguchi Shion... At least, that's what she thought, but when she woke up, she had gone back to when she was a second year student! To avoid dying by Shion's hands again, Himari thinks of a solution - - and that solution is to completely show Shion how she feels about him!

Himari's series of unfortunate events begins!

title.en: 86 -Eighty Six- Mahou Shoujo Regina ☆ Lena ~Tatakae! Ginga Koukou Senkan San Magnolia~

altTitles.ja: ８６―エイティシックス― 魔法少女レジーナ☆レーナ ～戦え！銀河航行戦艦サンマグノリア～

altTitles.en: 86 -Eighty Six- Magical Girl Regina ☆ Lena ~Fight! Galactic Cruise Battleship San Magnolia~

description.en: A new "86 -Eighty Six-" series spin-off set on the stage of the "Galactic Navigating Battleship San Magnolia"! To protect that ship and its people from their enemy, an army known as the Legion, the Handlers (Magical Girls) along with their partners the Eighty-Six (Guardian Spirits) run through the cosmos!And so, the battle of the Magical Girl Lena is about to begin...!

title.en: Inaho-kun wa Nise Kanojo no Hazu na no ni

altTitles.ja: 稲穂くんは偽カノジョのはずなのに

altTitles.ja-ro: Inaho-kun Wa Nise Kanojou No Hazu Nanoni

altTitles.en: Inaho-kun Is Supposed to Be a Fake Sweetheart

description.en:
Mori Shintaro, a new first-year student, yearns for the sparkling high school life of having a girlfriend and experiencing youth, but is ridiculed by those around him. His classmate, Inaho Sawatari, entered the school as the top student and is a highly regarded beauty. The two are not supposed to cross paths, but after an incident where they are mistaken for a couple, Inaho makes an unexpected proposal:
"Shall we pretend that we're really dating?"

---
**Notes:**
- The pre-serialization series is [Houkago no Cinderella-kun](https://mangadex.org/title/147b8fd6-5232-45df-993f-35c908cf41a2/houkago-no-cinderella-kun).

altTitles.ja: 監禁王

description.en:
A girl who calls herself a devil appeared before a timid student named Fumio Kijima. The girl claims to be a campaign girl from the demon world and she gives him the ability to “summon a room” from nothing but thin air.

At first he doesn’t abuse his power and uses it as a convenient ability in his every day life. But one day he is bullied by his classmates under an unfair pretext and is made to suffer. In the past he would have wallowed in misery and cried himself to sleep, but now he had a power to call upon.

“I will make them regret it!”

Using his powers to summon his “room”, he begins his era of confinement and brainwashing to achieve his goals.
description.es: Una chica que se llama a si misma una diabla aparece ante un timido estudiante llamado Fumio Kijima. La chica dice ser una chica de campaña del mundo diablo y le da la habilidad de "invocar una habitación" de la nada. Al principio no abusa su poder y lo usa como una habilidad conveniente en su vida diaria, pero un día es acosado por sus compañeros de clase bajo un pretexto injusto y sufre. En el pasado, se hubiera quedado callado sufriendo y llorando, pero ahora tenía un poder a su disponibilidad. "¡Haré que se arrepientan!" Usando sus poderes para invocar su "habitación," empieza su era de confinar y lavar cerebros para cumplir sus metas.
description.pt-br:
Uma garota que se chama de demônio apareceu diante de um estudante tímido chamado Fumio Kijima. A garota afirma ser uma garota de campanha do mundo dos demônios e ela lhe dá a capacidade de “convocar uma sala” do nada além do ar.

A princípio, ele não abusa de seu poder e o usa como uma habilidade conveniente em sua vida cotidiana. Mas um dia ele é intimidado por seus colegas sob um pretexto injusto e é obrigado a sofrer. No passado, ele teria se afundado na miséria e chorado até dormir, mas agora ele tinha um poder para invocar.

“Vou fazê-los se arrepender!”

Usando seus poderes para convocar seu “quarto”, ele começa sua era de confinamento e lavagem cerebral para alcançar seus objetivos.

altTitles.th: จักรกลสาวทะลุมิติ

altTitles.ja: 僕に恋するメカニカル

altTitles.zh-hk: 和我談戀愛的機器妹子

altTitles.zh: 和我谈恋爱的机器妹子

description.en: Shinjou Maita is trying to get new members for his movie research society club when he stumbles upon angelic first-year Hotohara Shiori. Life seems to be looking up for him, until a strange woman appears in his apartment, warning him that his life is in danger.
